titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the commanding of all souldiers, lately imployed in the fleet, vpon their arriuall, not to depart from their colours.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Windsor, the fifteenth day of December, in the first yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
